ISSUE.TITLE: Node v16 NPM can't install packages for nc-gui
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: For the nc-gui package, Node v14 can install without problems. Node v16 shows errors and can't install or upgrade packages. please provide the following details : NocoDB used as docker : false NocoDB version : 0.82.0 Database used in NC_DB URL : sqlite3 Project was created by clicking : New Project Database on which spreadsheet is created : sqlite3 OS on which NocoDB is running : Ubuntu 21.04 Node.js version if running as node : 16.13.0 NPM Version: 8.1.0 Database version : UNK **Steps To Reproduce** 1. git clone git@github.com:nocodb/nocodb.git (0.82.0 at the time) 2. cd ./nocodb/packages/nc-gui 3. npm i **Expected behavior** Expect NPM to install all packages. **Attached files** 1. Error from console for command 3 (npm i). [NPM Error 22 Nov 2021.log](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/files/7584973/NPM.Error.22.Nov.2021.log)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: refactor: add alert to notify user after upgrading show alert to notify user to clear old cache by hard refresh Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: make nc-gui node v16 compatible re #800 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
